Dear Nursery_E Admissions,

Thank you for your continued time throughout this process. Since Nursery_E is the remaining unmatched nursery, I wanted to ask one clear question so I can plan responsibly.

Is there any specific constraint that is preventing you from offering us the place (e.g., age group/room availability, required attendance pattern, required start date, sibling/priority ordering, or a particular schedule you must fill)? If there is *any* concrete condition under which we could be reconsidered—such as committing to a different fixed start date, a specific set of core hours, or providing a particular document/reference—please let me know and we will confirm immediately.

If, however, your priorities mean you will not be able to offer us the place under any circumstances, I would be grateful if you could tell me directly so I can pursue alternative childcare arrangements.

Sincerely,
Parent_E

Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your check-in and for reconfirming your availability.

At this stage, there are **no enrollment documents we need you to pre-complete** before an offer is made. If we move to the offer stage, we will send the standard enrollment pack immediately and can complete everything on a same-day basis.

That said, to help things move quickly *if* an offer is extended, it may be useful for you to have the following ready:
- Child and parent/guardian ID details (as applicable)
- Proof of address
- Immunization/health record information (if applicable)
- Emergency contacts and authorized pick-up list
- Any relevant medical/allergy information

As shared, our next decision point remains **by the end of Round 18**. We will contact you promptly if we move to an offer and will provide the exact forms and instructions at that time.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions
